name: W-locate
overview:
W-Locate is a dynamic leader in the area of Location Technologies. It provides both Indoor and Outdoor positioning products and services. Our company was established in 2010 by a very experienced team of tracking/monitoring enthusiasts in the service industry.

As a supplier of fleet management and indoor tracking technology to businesses and individuals worldwide, W-Locate works with local national companies like the A*Star, Ngee Ann Polytechnic, PSA, Cyclect Engineering, as well as smaller local and regional companies.

Our highly trained team of professionals will go above and beyond the sale to insure your satisfaction with our products and services. Our goal is to improve your bottom line whilst meeting your requirements.

With a complete line of location systems, we are able to offer a consultative approach to our future customers. During the initial meeting our account managers ask questions about your business/requirements to learn how it operates and where you may have opportunities for improvement (fleet, risk management, safety, human resources, etc). We then match the information to the right system for the lowest investment.

We are also listening for information that will help us identify other potential areas for return on investment not obvious to new users. As the GPS industry consolidates, companies that provide good products AND good service will rise to the top. W-Locate have invested heavily in technology, training and personnel to provide the best customer experience and service available.

Our technical support department provides a mix of network administration skills, project management abilities, electronics repair, training and management. Our internal advanced network architecture includes server onsite with several terabytes of storage for internal systems, data hosting and testing.

funding_rounds.source_description: Location Technology Company W-Locate Raises US$470,000 from TNF Ventures
